text: Hyman William Katz (1898â€“1988) was an American artist. He was born in Poland. He did printmaking for the Works Progress Administration (WPA). Katz's work is in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, the National Gallery of Art, the Philadelphia Museum of Art, and the Smithsonian American Art Museum. ==Gallery== Hyman Katz, Mechanic, 1936.jpg|Mechanic, 1936 Hyman Katz, World's Fair, 1939.jpg|World's Fair, 1939 Hyman Katz, Sewing, n.d.jpg|Sewing, n.d ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1988 deaths Category:American artists
title: Hyman Katz
